scripts.build: tasks 'rimraf dist' [ 'copy-files files dist' 'assets css/index.css dist' 'framework render js/fixture.js js/html.js files/200.html --selector html -o dist' ] 'optimize dist'
scripts.watch: tasks 'rimraf dist' [ 'copy-files files content dist -w' 'assets css/index.css js/index.js dist -w --no-min' 'serve-files dist --200 --port 3000 --dev' ]
